data.message: When I click send message button on any public page, it doesn't work anymore. I already reported this issue and it hasn't been resolved. Could you please fix this problem? Thanks!

replies.message: Thanks for reporting this to us, Alex! Due to the volume of reports we receive, it may take us a bit to review it. We appreciate your patience. -Elizabeth

I've reported this as far back as a year ago. They refuse to fix it and I do not know why. But if you submit and nothing happens, leave the page and come back. Or refresh the page. You should then see the comment.
